verses.verse: And as he went <S%G1607><s%> out of the temple, <S%G2411><s%> one <S%G1520><s%> of his disciples <S%G3101><s%> said <S%G3004><s%> to him, Master, <S%G1320><s%> see <S%G2396><s%> what <S%G4217><s%> manner <S%G4217><s%> of stones <S%G3037><s%> and what <S%G4217><s%> buildings <S%G3619><s%> are here! <S%G5602><s%>

And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> said <S%G2036><s%> to him, See <S%G991><s%> you these <S%G5025><s%> great <S%G3173><s%> buildings? <S%G3619><s%> there shall not be left <S%G863><s%> one stone <S%G3037><s%> on another, that shall not be thrown <S%G2647><s%> down. <S%G2647><s%>

And as he sat <S%G2521><s%> on the mount <S%G3735><s%> of Olives <S%G1636><s%> over <S%G2713><s%> against <S%G2713><s%> the temple, <S%G2411><s%> Peter <S%G4074><s%> and James <S%G2385><s%> and John <S%G2491><s%> and Andrew <S%G406><s%> asked <S%G1905><s%> him privately, <S%G2596><s%>

Tell <S%G2036><s%> us, when <S%G4218><s%> shall these <S%G5023><s%> things be? and what <S%G5101><s%> shall be the sign <S%G4592><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things shall be fulfilled? <S%G4931><s%>
And Jesus <S%G2424><s%> answering <S%G611><s%> them began <S%G756><s%> to say, <S%G3004><s%> Take heed <S%G991><s%> lest <S%G3361><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man deceive <S%G4105><s%> you:
For many <S%G4183><s%> shall come <S%G2064><s%> in my name, <S%G3686><s%> saying, <S%G3004><s%> I am <S%G1510><s%> Christ; and shall deceive <S%G4105><s%> many. <S%G4183><s%>

And when <S%G3752><s%> you shall hear <S%G191><s%> of wars <S%G4171><s%> and rumors <S%G189><s%> of wars, <S%G4171><s%> be you not troubled: <S%G2360><s%> for such things must <S%G1163><s%> needs be; but the end <S%G5056><s%> shall not be yet. <S%G3768><s%>

For nation <S%G1484><s%> shall rise <S%G1453><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> nation, <S%G1484><s%> and kingdom <S%G932><s%> against <S%G1909><s%> kingdom: <S%G932><s%> and there shall be earthquakes <S%G4578><s%> in divers places, <S%G5117><s%> and there shall be famines <S%G3042><s%> and troubles: <S%G5016><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> are the beginnings <S%G746><s%> of sorrows. <S%G5604><s%>

But take heed <S%G991><s%> to yourselves: <S%G1438><s%> for they shall deliver <S%G3860><s%> you up to councils; <S%G4892><s%> and in the synagogues <S%G4864><s%> you shall be beaten: <S%G1194><s%> and you shall be brought <S%G2476><s%> before <S%G1909><s%> rulers <S%G2232><s%> and kings <S%G935><s%> for my sake, <S%G1752><s%> for a testimony <S%G3142><s%> against them.
And the gospel <S%G2098><s%> must <S%G1163><s%> first <S%G4412><s%> be published <S%G2784><s%> among <S%G1519><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> nations. <S%G1484><s%>

But when <S%G3752><s%> they shall lead <S%G71><s%> you, and deliver <S%G3860><s%> you up, take no <S%G3361><s%> thought <S%G4305><s%> beforehand <S%G4305><s%> what <S%G5101><s%> you shall speak, <S%G2980><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> do you premeditate: <S%G3191><s%> but whatever <S%G3739><s%> <S%G1437><s%> shall be given <S%G1325><s%> you in that hour, <S%G5610><s%> that speak <S%G2980><s%> you: for it is not you that speak, <S%G2980><s%> but the Holy <S%G40><s%> Ghost. <S%G4151><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> shall betray <S%G3860><s%> the brother <S%G80><s%> to death, <S%G2288><s%> and the father <S%G3962><s%> the son; <S%G5043><s%> and children <S%G5043><s%> shall rise <S%G1881><s%> up against <S%G1909><s%> their parents, <S%G1118><s%> and shall cause <S%G2289><s%> them to be put <S%G2289><s%> to death. <S%G2289><s%>

And you shall be hated <S%G3404><s%> of all <S%G3956><s%> men for my name's <S%G3686><s%> sake: but he that shall endure <S%G5278><s%> to the end, <S%G5056><s%> the same <S%G3778><s%> shall be saved. <S%G4982><s%>

But when <S%G3752><s%> you shall see <S%G1492><s%> the abomination <S%G946><s%> of desolation, <S%G2050><s%> spoken <S%G4483><s%> of by Daniel <S%G1158><s%> the prophet, <S%G4396><s%> standing <S%G2476><s%> where <S%G3699><s%> it ought <S%G1163><s%> not, (let him that reads <S%G314><s%> understand, <S%G3539><s%> ) then <S%G5119><s%> let them that be in Judaea <S%G2449><s%> flee <S%G5343><s%> to the mountains: <S%G3735><s%>

And let him that is on <S%G1909><s%> the housetop <S%G1430><s%> not go <S%G2597><s%> down <S%G2597><s%> into <S%G1519><s%> the house, <S%G3614><s%> neither <S%G3366><s%> enter <S%G1525><s%> therein, to take <S%G142><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> thing out of his house: <S%G3614><s%>
And let him that is in the field <S%G68><s%> not turn <S%G1994><s%> back <S%G617><s%> again <S%G1994><s%> for to take <S%G142><s%> up his garment. <S%G2440><s%>
But woe <S%G3759><s%> to them that are with child, <S%G1722><s%> <S%G1064><s%> <S%G2192><s%> and to them that give suck <S%G2337><s%> in those <S%G1565><s%> days! <S%G2250><s%>
And pray <S%G4336><s%> you that your <S%G5216><s%> flight <S%G5437><s%> be not in the winter. <S%G5494><s%>

For in those <S%G1565><s%> days <S%G2250><s%> shall be affliction, <S%G2347><s%> such <S%G3634><s%> as was not from the beginning <S%G746><s%> of the creation <S%G2937><s%> which <S%G3739><s%> God <S%G2316><s%> created <S%G2936><s%> to this <S%G3568><s%> time, <S%G3568><s%> neither <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3361><s%> shall be.

And except <S%G1508><s%> that the Lord <S%G2962><s%> had shortened <S%G2856><s%> those <S%G3588><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> no <S%G3756><s%> <S%G3956><s%> flesh <S%G4561><s%> should be saved: <S%G4982><s%> but for the elect's <S%G1588><s%> sake, whom <S%G3739><s%> he has chosen, <S%G1586><s%> he has shortened <S%G2856><s%> the days. <S%G2250><s%>

And then <S%G5119><s%> if <S%G1437><s%> any <S%G5100><s%> man shall say <S%G2036><s%> to you, See, <S%G2400><s%> here <S%G5602><s%> is Christ; <S%G5547><s%> or, <S%G2228><s%> see, <S%G2400><s%> he is there; <S%G1563><s%> believe <S%G4100><s%> him not:

For false <S%G5580><s%> Christs <S%G5580><s%> and false <S%G5578><s%> prophets <S%G5578><s%> shall rise, <S%G1453><s%> and shall show <S%G1325><s%> signs <S%G4592><s%> and wonders, <S%G5059><s%> to seduce, <S%G635><s%> if <S%G1487><s%> it were possible, <S%G1415><s%> even <S%G2532><s%> the elect. <S%G1588><s%>
But take you heed: <S%G991><s%> behold, <S%G2400><s%> I have foretold <S%G4280><s%> you all <S%G3956><s%> things.

But in those <S%G3588><s%> days, <S%G2250><s%> after <S%G3326><s%> that tribulation, <S%G2347><s%> the sun <S%G2246><s%> shall be darkened, <S%G4654><s%> and the moon <S%G4582><s%> shall not give <S%G1325><s%> her light, <S%G5338><s%>
And the stars <S%G792><s%> of heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall fall, <S%G1601><s%> and the powers <S%G1411><s%> that are in heaven <S%G3772><s%> shall be shaken. <S%G4531><s%>

And then <S%G5119><s%> shall they see <S%G3700><s%> the Son <S%G5207><s%> of man <S%G444><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> in the clouds <S%G3507><s%> with great <S%G4183><s%> power <S%G1411><s%> and glory. <S%G1391><s%>

And then <S%G5119><s%> shall he send <S%G649><s%> his angels, <S%G32><s%> and shall gather <S%G1996><s%> together <S%G1996><s%> his elect <S%G1588><s%> from the four <S%G5064><s%> winds, <S%G417><s%> from the uttermost <S%G206><s%> part of the earth <S%G1093><s%> to the uttermost <S%G206><s%> part of heaven. <S%G3772><s%>

Now <S%G1161><s%> learn <S%G3129><s%> a parable <S%G3850><s%> of the fig <S%G4808><s%> tree; <S%G4808><s%> When <S%G3752><s%> her branch <S%G2798><s%> is yet <S%G2236><s%> tender, <S%G527><s%> and puts <S%G1631><s%> forth <S%G1631><s%> leaves, <S%G5444><s%> you know <S%G1097><s%> that summer <S%G2330><s%> is near: <S%G1451><s%>

So <S%G2532><s%> you in like <S%G2532><s%> manner, <S%G3779><s%> when <S%G3752><s%> you shall see <S%G1492><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things come <S%G1096><s%> to pass, know <S%G1097><s%> that it is near, <S%G1451><s%> even at <S%G1909><s%> the doors. <S%G2374><s%>

Truly <S%G281><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you, that this <S%G3778><s%> generation <S%G1074><s%> shall not pass, <S%G3928><s%> till <S%G3360><s%> all <S%G3956><s%> these <S%G5023><s%> things be done. <S%G1096><s%>
Heaven <S%G3772><s%> and earth <S%G1093><s%> shall pass <S%G3928><s%> away: <S%G3928><s%> but my words <S%G3056><s%> shall not pass <S%G3928><s%> away. <S%G3928><s%>

But of that day <S%G2250><s%> and that hour <S%G5610><s%> knows <S%G1492><s%> no <S%G3762><s%> man, <S%G3762><s%> no, not the angels <S%G32><s%> which <S%G3588><s%> are in heaven, <S%G3772><s%> neither <S%G3761><s%> the Son, <S%G5207><s%> but the Father. <S%G3962><s%>
Take you heed, <S%G991><s%> watch <S%G69><s%> and pray: <S%G4336><s%> for you know <S%G1492><s%> not when <S%G4218><s%> the time <S%G2540><s%> is.

For the Son of Man is as a man <S%G444><s%> taking a far journey, <S%G590><s%> who left <S%G863><s%> his house, <S%G3614><s%> and gave <S%G1325><s%> authority <S%G1849><s%> to his servants, <S%G1401><s%> and to every <S%G1538><s%> man his work, <S%G2041><s%> and commanded <S%G1781><s%> the porter <S%G2377><s%> to watch. <S%G1127><s%>

Watch <S%G1127><s%> you therefore: <S%G3767><s%> for you know <S%G1492><s%> not when <S%G4218><s%> the master <S%G2962><s%> of the house <S%G3614><s%> comes, <S%G2064><s%> at even, <S%G3796><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at midnight, <S%G3317><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> at the cock-crowing, <S%G219><s%> or <S%G2228><s%> in the morning: <S%G4404><s%>
Lest <S%G3361><s%> coming <S%G2064><s%> suddenly <S%G1810><s%> he find <S%G2147><s%> you sleeping. <S%G2518><s%>
And what <S%G3739><s%> I say <S%G3004><s%> to you I say <S%G3004><s%> to all, <S%G3956><s%> Watch. <S%G1127><s%>
